belongs_to_collection.name: Si Buta dari Gua Hantu - Collection

original_title: Si Buta dari Gua Hantu: Sorga yang Hilang
overview: In a forest in Mount Bromo, Badra, the Blind Fighter, finds a woman on a stretcher, attacked by a group of villains. Badra quickly acts. Upon her death, the woman asks Badra to take care of the children. So he finds the father of the children. On the way, he is ambushed by his arch enemy and is hurt. The king helps him to recover, then he meets again with his arch enemy.
title: The Blind Man from Ghost Cave: Lost Paradise
